      • tcastcolor

        public boolean tcastcolor(java.lang.String newcolor)
                   throws NotValidColor,
                          FailedConfigSave
        Changes the default color of the chat text. Parameter "newcolor" MUST be in the form of a color code. (ex: &a)
        Parameters:
        newcolor -
        Returns:
        true if the color was successfully changed.
        Throws:
        NotValidColor
